title: Trump Backs Off New York Quarantine Idea as Global Coronavirus Deaths Top 30,000 - The Wall Street Journal

content:
President Trump sparred with several state governors over how to contain the coronavirus pandemic this weekend, as China further eased restrictions that had locked down its economy and fatalities shot past 30,000 globally.
